title: The Power Of The Pendant (1994) Two halves of an ancient puzzle are the only hope.

sources.title: The Power Of The Pendant (1994) Two halves of an ancient puzzle are the only hope.
sources.description:
In a chaotic, quake-ravaged 2007 Los Angeles, martial arts brothers Billy and Jimmy Lee must battle street gangs, madcap villains, and the power-hungry Koga Shuko to protect their half of a mystical medallion that could make him unstoppable. With punches flying, wisecracks rolling, and Alyssa Milano's Marian leading the resistance, it's a fight to save the cityâ€”and maybe the world!!

Director: James Yukich
Writers: Paul Dini, Neal Shusterman, Michael Davis
Stars: Robert Patrick, Mark Dacascos, Scott Wolf, Alyssa Milano & Vanna White
Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Sci-Fi

Release date: November 4, 1994 (USA)
Budget: $7,850,000 (estimated)
